room_title: Escape room "Captive" by Escape Room Zone in Detroit
room_description: The smell of mold fills your nose as you awaken in the cold, damp, basement of your captor's lair. As you struggle to escape from his clutches, the very essence of your being will be tested. Do you have what it takes to be the first to escape from him, or will you become one of the countless bodies, stashed beneath his house?
